website_summaries.verdict: A complete olive oil bottle set at a decent price.
pros: Comes in a complete kit that includes the bottle, 2 pourers, travel caps, and a metal funnel
Glass is brown to protect the oil from sunlight
Decent price, and a good gift idea
cons: Some reports of the spouts starting to rust after a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great product, beyond superior customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this: it arrived with slight damage from transit to just one of the many components. Not the fault of the seller. Aozita was RELENTLESS in their pursuit of my satisfaction. All is well, the product is better than I expected, and I'm completely floored that --these days-- you can still find this sort of dedication to satisfying the customer. Standing ovation, Aozita.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tilford

customer_reviews.title: perfection
customer_reviews.text: The glass oil set is exactly as that description reads. I love it and use it every day to help me drizzle oils on veggies and in the pan. it helps to control the volume and spreads it much better than just pouring it in with the original oil bottle.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two because I knew I would like them and I was not disappointed. I am always weary of buying any glass product because of the possibility of damage in shipping but these were packaged well. The stopper fits tight and so do the lids. I like the darker color of the glass as well. The only improvements I can make on this product is 1. a larger version to hold more oil and 2. some way of differentiating bottles maybe with a colored ring because I like to infuse my oils for cooking. Some with assorted seasonings others with hot peppers. Overall, a great product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Japhrimel Pierce

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle set. The darker glass keeps my oil fresh. The little flip cap works wonderful and I feel safe knowing flies and other small bugs aren't getting inside. Didn't think I'd need the funnel, but the opening is small and it worked perfectly to keep the oil from dripping down the bottle when I refilled. I love that it comes with other caps. I had another bottle that had a broken tip, so now I've got two! It looks nice, and works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Barr

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased long ago
customer_reviews.text: The bottle and spouts make using oil so much easier. I no longer have to worry about any left over oil running down the bottle and staining my countertops. The ez pour spouts have a small opening so whatever little bit can fall back into the bottle. The rubber part of the spout that slides into the bottle opening gets slightly loose, but it’s a small trade off to ensure its seated. I have yet to give the bottle a thorough cleaning so I will update when that time comes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control portions
customer_reviews.text: We love to cook and always use olive oil. We buy bug bottles of it but tend to use too much so purchased this to cut down on waste and control where the oil goes. The kit comes with 2 spouts , 2 caps, and a funnel. We are extremely happy with our purchase and highly recommend you get this for your kitchen. It looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: BPeeples

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE THEY'RE COLOR BLIND
customer_reviews.text: This supposed 'BROWN' Olive Oil Bottle is the EXACT same color as their 'GREEN' Olive Oil Bottle. I have a television kitchen/cooking class to teach on Saturday so I do not have the time to return it as I need it for display. AGAIN, be aware! DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM IF YOU ACTUALLY THINK IT IS BROWN GLASS. IT IS NOT! Thanks for milking me for a few bucks, it's not appreciated at all.
customer_reviews.author: 76th & Madison 10021

customer_reviews.title: NOT AMBER
customer_reviews.text: I ordered amber and got olive green. I needed to use it but it is not what I ordered or what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Leaks terribly.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this product, but sadly it was a total let down. It leaks terribly. The top is secured in on my part however it seems it wasn’t made it fit well. It tried to come out when tipped over. Wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: After trying sprayers, pumps, and all kinds of expensive gadgets for dispensing a drop of oil -- more, this is it. Simple perfection! The bottle is easy to pick up and hold. I can easily pour out "just a drop". Oil doesn't run down the side (it can drip a tiny bit after a pour, but I just wipe it). And, with the metal cover plate on the top, it keeps air out and freshness in. Sometimes, a simple, well-made product is best. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: Portland Fella

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Flap cap was damaged and came apart in shipping. Bottle and other components were ok. Bottle has many minor cosmetic imperfections like bubbles and ridges. Fit of spouts and caps were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: rubber stoppers too large for bottle - fall out
customer_reviews.text: neither stopper fits bottle more than half way and both fell out into my pot when I went to pour. :( pretty set but defective.
customer_reviews.author: AtoZ

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty handy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty good and I’m glad I got it. We decided to use the tip that hinges open (it comes with two and taking forever the tiny black rubber tip every time we wanted to use it seemed more annoying) but the lid had fallen off the hinge a few times. It’s fine, and easy to reattach, but it’s a touch flimsy. Otherwise we really like it! Way easier than grabbing a giant jug and taking the lid off! Smaller opening means we don’t accidentally use too much oil too
customer_reviews.author: Calli

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this dispenser and the company is very responsive.
customer_reviews.text: This great set for using "just the right amount" of olive oil is everything I could possibly want! Not only does it come with two spouts, plus a funnel, plus caps for the bottle when not being used, the company is really responsive to questions and prompt with their info. I really love this set; and probably will buy another in the near future for other oils I use in cooking and baking. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: ASONGBIRD

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and avoid having to clean up olive oil when it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: This bottle lasted less than two years. We didn’t wash it in the dishwasher and only used it with olive oil. Then, last week, I simply placed it on the countertop and it broke, spilling all of the olive oil in between the counter and the oven. We had to pull the oven out and spend an hour cleaning up olive oil off the stove, the counter and the ground. I was going to buy another bottle but then realized that I could just take the label off of an empty wine bottle and use that. The spout that came with this bottle fits a wine bottle and the wine bottle is much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: It does what it claims to do
customer_reviews.text: For a pretty low price, you get a sturdy (at least as far as I can tell) glass bottle, a pair of rubber-gasketed dispensers, two plastic stoppers and two threaded caps. For me, that's pretty much all the olive oil-accessories I could picture needing (though admittedly I'm just leaving it in the refrigerator until I need it, and leave the bottle on the counter for a few hours to liquify). The only "complaint" I might have is that you can't very easily eyeball how much is left, but the bottle never claims to do that in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: KCM

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, too many pieces
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle! Since it's glass I am able to wash it in the dishwasher when needed. It holds 16.5 ounces olive oil and is easy to refill from a 3L can to the bottle with the included funnel. However, I do feel like it comes with too many pieces. I only use the flip top spout and funnel. Taking the plastic cover off of the other spout is too much and invites the piece getting lost. All of the extra pieces are just sitting in the box it came in. However, I didn't deduct a star because I like that they are allowing us to decide how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice set and we are more than pleased with our purchase. The funnel is perfect for filling the bottle. The bottle is just the right size to grip and pour. There are two different spouts, one with a lid and one with a flip top. Then you and remove the spouts and seal the jar with a seal and cap. We looked at several jars but this one caught our eye because it included the different tops. I would highly recommend this set and I have not received anything for this review, it comes from honestly enjoying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE that this bottle is dripless!!
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy larger bottles of oil, but they aren't real handy for grabbing with one hand and pouring while you're stirring with the other hand. This bottle is the perfect size. I was skeptical about the claims of being drip-less, but it really is!! That's the best feature -- no more sticky oil residue down the sides of the bottle or in the cabinet where the bottle sits. The tiny funnel was a great added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: To me for oil dispensers the spout is very important. Many leaks due to poor quality - it's not the bottles. I've had many different types of spouts and these are very nice quality. It fits into the bottle very snug and tight so never leaks. It is priced a bit higher than others on here as same price you get double quantity which I have. The spouts are nice as snug. The other reason I took away a star is the spout with the rubber top I've already lost. It would be nice if it had the attached string so it keeps it on the spout.
customer_reviews.author: readyornot

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is great. The colored glass protects the oil. It comes with caps that will also protect the oil and drisslers that have covers. and the price is so reasonable. I'm so pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: yank

customer_reviews.title: Great, Attractive, Useful Bottle
customer_reviews.text: There was a pleasant surprise opening this package. The bottle is the perfect size, not too small where one would have to constantly refill and not too large, where it is easy to grasp and pour. The bottle is dark colored so that no light can penetrate and the oil is properly preserved. I love the gadgets that come with this bottle. You receive a funnel...easy refill with no mess and two pouring spouts. The funnel and spouts are stainless steel. So, all in all a lovely tidy package, a wonderful buy and easy to operate. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Artsygal

customer_reviews.title: Quality pour w/cap options
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my old one that flange had gotten loose on. This one came with two pour options and a cap for when the bottle is not in use. I personally use the pour with the flapper on it, because I cook with oil nightly. I also love that this is tinted glass, because I've read that that preserves olive oil longer (not sure mine can go bad as often as I use it, but anything to preserve the awesome flavor is good to me!). To be fair, im not sure what a five star oil pourer would feel like, but this one works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott1282

customer_reviews.title: What I had been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a new poor top for my olive oil container and when I found this package deal at such a savings compared to buying just the tops, I ordered it. Very pleased with the weight of the bottle and with the two different types of pourspouts that come with it as well as the funnel. I’ve already fill my container up with my wonderful olive oil and look forward to using it with more ease with the one I have been using. It’s nice to have the extra pieces in case something happens to one of them
customer_reviews.author: NINA F BAIN

customer_reviews.title: Easy kitchen upgrade for those who use a lot of oil
customer_reviews.text: I like cooking with olive oil, and end up going through maybe a gallon a year. To reduce waste, I purchase 3 liter jugs of oil, so I bought this bottle to use while cooking. I now have two, one for olive oil and one for my canola oil. Pros: * Nice color (stop olive oil from going bad as easily) * Easy pour cap * Good pour speed for cooking or adding directly to food Cons: * When (not if) you get some oil on the glass, it is very slippery! (Make sure to wipe it down every so often)
customer_reviews.author: Toozinger

customer_reviews.title: Better then hoped for
customer_reviews.text: We've been using for a couple of months and love this bottle and the variety of tops to pour and protect. I just refilled the olive oil again today with the handy smart little enclosed funnel. Works great. Anyway the best thing is the pouring top that automatically opens and closes when you pour so that your olive oil is kept clean of dust and excess air exposure. It is so well engineered and good quality and attractive to boot. We've been looking for something like this for our olive oil for a long time. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Church

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done Oil Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This oil dispenser is easy to use. Olive oil is used in our house in every meal. It precisely pours what you are looking for and the shaded glass keeps light sensitive oils at their peak. There is a small spout cover which is a great feature making sure your oil stays pure and decreases risk of contamination in a busy kitchen. Recommended for novice to pro of cooking enthusists.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyne

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: $9.99 bargain. Nice dark green bottle to protect the oil from light (just-right 17 oz size), 2 different pour spouts, a perfect size funnel and two screw caps with inserts. Exactly what I was looking for. Will buy more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great option if you buy olive oil in bulk
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant pourer that works really well. We use the pourer that has a small, hinged cover that opens on its own when you begin to pour, and then closes back. Works great! The olive oil seems to retain its quality, too. It is a little messy to refill since it's so narrow, but we just pour the oil in through a funnel usually and that keeps it from getting everywhere. We've had this product for over a year and it has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Erstad

customer_reviews.title: Quality bottle with the right accessories
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the giant Costco bottle for the longest time but recently we wanted to organize our kitchen to maximize space. I haven't purchased any other bottles but this one works extremely well. Packaged well from manufacturer and comes with good quality accessories (2x pourers, 1x funnel, and 2x plugs w/ caps). I personally ended up throwing everything away except one of the pourers. The bottle is a perfect size for even those with smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: PandaMan714

customer_reviews.title: The spout wasn’t included in the box!
customer_reviews.text: Will return - the spout wasn’t included in the box. What a disappointment! It’s going back for obvious reasons. Bad choice on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulk oil purchases
customer_reviews.text: I buy my olive and vegetable oils in bulk. The containers the oil comes in from the store are huge and take up way too much space in my cupboard. I love this set as an alternative to the store bought containers. The bottle looks classy and I really enjoy the lidded spout. I like that the oil comes out in a slow steady stream - very easy to control amount of oil in my cooking. The funnel was super cheap but functional. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Graves

customer_reviews.title: Funnel included!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an olive oil bottle for a while, and this one is just perfect! The product comes with a stainless steel funnel, a pourer with a flip lid, a poure with a cap, and two inserts and caps to seal it for other uses. I would highly recommend this olive oil bottle to all my friends. The product was well packaged, and the seller is very friendly and offers help if needed. Great transaction!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love it but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this olive oil bottle. It's the right size making it easy to hold, uses green glass to prevent oxidation, comes with a variety of dispensing nozzles and caps... but the metal flap on the spout does not close off the spout tube after pouring. The little flap that seals the opening in the spout falls back to the opposite side of the spout leaving it exposed to air and anything else that wants to get in. All that's needed is to incorporate a stop on the flap so it falls back on top of the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Ed D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is made of thick glass with a good heft. the brown tint is not so dark that it obscures the contents so you will be able to keep an eye on how full the bottle is. I am happy with the pouring spouts, they are all metal and the stoppers fit securely into the bottle. The included funnel makes filling easy and I love the fact that this is also metal. Overall I got exactly what I wanted, a good sturdy bottle with well made durable pouring spouts.
customer_reviews.author: tor

customer_reviews.title: Good Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this oil bottle. I have had several over the years and I like this one very much. I like the metal "flap" that can close off the top. I never use the funnel for this bottle, but it is a handy little item. I like that I have an extra spout for something as well as a couple of screw tops. Sometimes vinegars, etc come in nice looking bottles so I am sure these extra tops and spout will be used.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Mcclung

customer_reviews.title: Oil pour bottle that works great most of the time
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of some nitpicky downsides, I overall prefer using this over finessing a jug of oil. The only problem I have with it is that there is a delay when trying to pour the oil; due to the sharp curvature at the top of the bottle, oil first has to fill up a small reservoir created by that curvature before flowing out of the nozzle. I sometimes find myself accidentally over-pouring the oil.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Classy, functional and perfect for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to use in the kitchen. Once filled this bottle allows me to grab, pure in pan, and place back on the counter with ease. It doesn’t drip or spill. Narrow and tall, the bottle takes little space atop the counter and is left very near the stove. It’s decorative and classy looking too. The only part I’d change is the fill device; it has little depth and if I’m filling from a large can of oil then it’s a challenge to not have some spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Mike from SJ

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I was eagerly awaiting the product to use in my kitchen. I filled it completely with olive oil and had placed it on my kitchen granite countertop. The bottle tripped accidentally and broke into fine pieces when it hit the countertop. It made a big mess in my kitchen as there were oil and glass pieces everywhere. The bottle glass might not be of good quality. Extremely disappointed. Update:07/02/20 I contacted the seller and they offered a refund or a replacement. I decided to go for the replacement because I needed a bottle urgently and also decided to give it another chance. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the enthusiastic home cook who regularly uses olive oil
customer_reviews.text: So very much easier to use and control the flow and amount of oil into whatever you're cooking than an actual bottle of olive oil. And it allows you to buy bigger, less expensive per once oil and then use the supplied funnel to fill the bottle, attaching one or another of the tops that are also supplied. Cleaning the bottle has never occurred to me, I simply top off the bottle when needed. I suppose I should look up the necessity of cleaning the thing occassionally.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Weiner

customer_reviews.title: wastage of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy guy's 2 expensive for a small size bottle . I bought it looking at review s but you can buy at much lesser price out there .. I was just concerned about COVID 19 so decided not to go store and ordered . I will be returning soon. Wastage of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok... nothing great
customer_reviews.text: Over the course of a couple of months, the rubber “gasket” on the bottom of the spout (where it goes into the bottle) became compressed and didn’t want to securely stay in the bottle. It slipped into and out of the bottle with too much ease. This caused me concern that it might simply slide out of the bottle while pouring. Instead of taking that chance, I tossed it and bought a better oil dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: L. R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: All I could find were cheaply made bottles when I could remember to look for them. Finally remembered to check Amazon and came upon this. I love that it's dark glass since light hurts the oil. Has everything you could possibly need in one package and then some. Bottle arrived in good condition and I'm extremely pleased with the quality of it. I went ahead and ordered some quality olive oil to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Functional But Too Tall
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it was too tall for us to fit in our cabinet. It was still too tall to use in the pantry with the sprout. The sprout is really long and adds to the height. Other than that, the glass was sturdy. The sprouts and attachments were thin metal and didn't feel as 'rich' but it wasn't 'cheap' either. It was just... there. Didn't use this with oil so I can't share anything on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely satisfied with the bottle set
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely satisfied with the bottle set. The tops all work perfectly and the bottle is just the right size for quick grab and drizzles. Like any good kitchen tool, you don't even have to think about it, it's just there when you reach for it and it works
customer_reviews.author: L. Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I love the extra lids and stoppers for sealing it. We'll be moving soon and having the lid to close it up will be a bit of peace of mind since it won't leak. The spout with the lid is great, I currently have the flippy lid on the bottle right now. Easy to pour, doesn't get sticky or have residue on the outside of the bottle; I'd definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: CWalter

customer_reviews.title: Robber Stopper provids better Seal, no plastic Straw fo better design
customer_reviews.text: Better than the ones in big box stores which often have plastic stopper, no little lid (built in) covering the spout opening. The robber stopper will likely be better at maintaining it's seal. Best is the spout design that doesn't need te the annoying plastic straw for air/draw. Green color is what is said to keep olive oil fresher longer
customer_reviews.author: Hudson Valley Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Drizzling is so much easier now! I was using store-bought bottles of olive oil and too much was pouring out. This purchase gave me a couple of spouts and even a little funnel to help refill the bottle. I wish I had bought this years ago, but happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Giving it 4 stars because...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 4 star because the little flip lid stopper it came with was flimsy. I accidentally knocked it against the cabinet (not hard at all) and it came off. It never worked properly again afterwards so I threw it away. Aside from that I have no other issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yuina

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for olive oil. It’s easy to use and looks great in my countertop. I like that they give you two different options for the top. I prefer the flip top since it makes it easier to drizzle oil while I’m cooking and I feel kind of fancy! Lol. It also includes a funnel which makes it super easy to put the oil into the container.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I use two types of oil in my kitchen. Olive and Blended. I needed two different color of bottles to keep them separated so I have my olive oil in a clear bottle and the blended oil in the Aozita bottle. The added caps , funnel and flip cap on the pouring spout are both very useful and protect the product. I would certainly buy this bottle again
customer_reviews.author: W. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is just what you would expect, and a great value for the price. I especially wanted to mention the excellent customer service when I had an issue on delivery. Company was immediately responsive and also immediately solved the problem. I would highly recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bottles for kitchen organization
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. I'm always trying to find a way to organize my kitchen and this helped me organize my oils and vinegars in a beautiful way. The bottles feel sturdy and good quality. (Also I used a metallic sharpie to write the names on the bottles)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, I’ve had better
customer_reviews.text: Mine came unbalanced so it rocks when it’s put down. Not very well made but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: habebe

customer_reviews.title: Very well made...
customer_reviews.text: My past olive oil bottle came apart and it was more expensive to purchase replacement parts than to purchase this new one. Just love the various dispensers and the funnel to fill the bottle is an excellent addition and makes filing so easy and messy free. I am so happy with this olive oil bottle, as is my wife. Great product and highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Finally...no more dripping olive oil!
customer_reviews.text: We finally got fed up with our olive oil dispenser that was dripping all over the side of the bottle and found this little gem. First of all it holds more than our previous dispenser which is nice. The darker color makes it easy to tell which one is olive oil vs. the similar style dispenser we use by the sink with dish soap (not a fun mistake to make!). Best of all, the flip top lid keeps the olive oil from dripping so we aren't picking up a slippery, greasy jar and possibly dropping it on the floor! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: works better than a more expensive kind i had
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly this works really good, it's simple design is much better than the more expensive ones I've had
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great without dripping.
customer_reviews.text: The olive oil bottle is a correct size, holds plenty without taking up a lot of counter space. I like the closeable flap to keep the oil fresh. The included metal filler makes it easy to fill the bottle. Great bottle for the money. The shipment from Amazon worked great with no problems. Would not hesitate to buy from Aozita.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Olive Oil Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase. I've had other olive oil dispensers in the past and I like this one better for a couple different reasons. One is that it comes with a funnel that's super helpful for when you are refilling it. Two is that it's dark in color, so your oil will stay fresh longer, and three is that the dispenser top has a flap on it so it's not exposed (esp. for vinegar this is a nice feature because it will keep fruit flies out).
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bottle for oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store on my countertop. I also wanted the pourer. It is easy to pour the right amount into a pan. I like that it is dark glass to help preserve the oil. It also comes with a second pourer and a funnel for easy filling. I am considering buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Teacup

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a dark-colored bottle so that I could get rid of the original bottle my olive oil comes in - it always drips. This has solved that problem. I love that it comes with a funnel and your choice of different tops as well. It's working perfectly and is the exact size and look that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Ostlie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Great Looking Olive Oil Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Just received this olive oil decanter and so far I like everything about it! The color and size are great! This product came with several extras. I was especially glad to see the small pouring funnel. I use a lot of olive oil in my cooking so I think this will really be an added addition to my new kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good bottle for olive oil
customer_reviews.text: It's a plain, but visually pleasant bottle for olive oil. It would be good for infusing some olive oil. The funnel is a nice inclusion. My only complaint is that the top does not fit snugly into the bottle and I feel as though it will fall out at some point when I'm pouring or if I were to accidentally pick it up by the spout.
customer_reviews.author: TJ F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this product; however, I only gave it 4 stars because I really needed it in a smaller size. I did find that the stopper doesn't stay open like I thought it would when I use it; however, that is probably because I'm only using a very small amount at a time. I do love the way it looks on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: twin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oil bottle
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product at a wonderful price. I liked how it came with different pour spouts and it’s relatively easy to switch them out. I haven’t used the item just yet, but do wish the bottle was slightly larger as is very tall and skinny. I initially purchased because I got a Costco sized olive oil since we go through it so much, but wanted something we could easily control the pour with. This gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Pegasus

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil/vinegar bottle because it's a)pretty, b)highly functional, and c)the perfect size. The bottle is darker than most, which is supposed to keep my olive oil safe, and the pour spout is second to none! When I need another dispenser bottle, I will be back!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gourmet Bottle
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. I love plenty of Olive oil available in the kitchen, good olive oil. This bottle is very nice to have for holding that oil and the dark green bottle is excellent for preserving it and protecting the oil from turning rancid which ruins good oil. Sunlight turns oil rancid and makes it bitter. Love my bottle !
customer_reviews.author: Stirling

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this came with a funnel which made transferring olive oil easy. I also like that it’s not too heavy because from first impressions it looked like it might be. My husband and son now feel more “chef life” when they are cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing for my avocado oil because allegedly the darker glass protects the oil better (who knows) anyway I like the little flip thing on the pourer that shuts it and I like the little funnel things too. I say if your reading this buy this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. The bottle is perfect for an olive-oil dispenser. Dark glass. I was surprised at the number of optional tops included. I love the little metal swing/flip top. Also included: a spout top with cap, a screw top to completely close the bottle, and a few others. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Better way to dispense my olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: I use. Quite a bit of oil in my cooking. This makes it much easier to pour and control the amount of oil needed. Easy to refill with the included funnel. Also included stoppers and two pour spouts.
customer_reviews.author: Hank LPD

customer_reviews.title: One of our greatest kitchen purchases
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of EVOO in our cooking, and using the container it comes in just became a pain. We buy in larger containers with screw lids, and once we started using this, we'll never be able to go back. We leave it right by our stove, and when we're ready to cook, the oil is ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: dj walker

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received my bottle yesterday and it's more green than brown. I wanted a dark brown bottle for Olive Oil as I already use a dark green bottle for Avocado oil. Also, pour spout with the flip top doesn't have a snug fit (like my other bottles do). I'm concerned that it's going to just fall out one day. Somewhat disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Renee Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cute cooking oil bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have mall hands and I like the fact I can grasp it without much effort I like the fact I keep it near my stove for cooking and there no labels it’s very tidy looking for company one over or oils and vinegar for dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Bellapoet

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Its really nice and Its packed really well, they even delivered right in front of my door surprisingly (live in a condo). About the product I like it a lot. I never own one before, what I love about it I no longer over pour I now can control it and of course that being said it save money in the long run. So if you are thinking to have one I highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle for oils
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking bottle for dispensing olive oil, other oils or vinegar. It comes with a couple of stoppers and tops and works very well. I use it to drizzle olive oil in cooking. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DHBRef

customer_reviews.title: No drips!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Aozita oil bottle. I wanted a bottle that I could easily pour into a measuring spoon, or just put the right amount in a skillet. It works great, and there are no nasty drips to deal with. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: G. R.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles. I keep them sitting on my counter for convenience. One for EVOO and one for canola oil. The spouts keep from dispensing to much oil at once. They hold plenty of oil so I'm not constantly refilling. I also like the dark color to help protect the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill, beautiful to keep, convenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Always wanted a bottle like this and I was very impressed with all the little tools that come along with the bottle to help fill it and to keep it closed. They thought of everything. I only marked 3 in easy to clean because I don’t imagine ever cleaning the bottle once it has oil in it. I did rinse it out in soapy water when opened and it was just fine. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Dr D

customer_reviews.title: Other use besides storing olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a new house & I wanted something a little different to sit on the counter top to hold dish wshing liquid & hand soap. This bottle is perfect. The color was a real bonus as I didn't want green. The different tips & the funnel were also great additions for filling the bottle. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: After buying the enormous 3-liter bottles of olive oil at Costco, I needed something to help me control the flow! I had been wanting easier access to olive oil for a while and finally just spent the little bit of money. It was completely worth it, let me tell you. This very aesthetic bottle now graces my counter and I get to feel like a true chef -lightly- drizzling olive oil into pans. Maybe it was just me that always accidentally poured too much into the pan before and had to pour it back into the bottle, but this thing SOLVED my PROBLEM. buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Harpe

customer_reviews.title: Home Cook's Dream
customer_reviews.text: Started cooking at home due to pandemic and found my tools lacking. Opening and pouring out of an olive oil bottle was clumsy and hard to control. This bottle protects my oil and makes it easy to pour with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: LMW

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: The spout on this makes it so easy to control how much olive oil goes in your pan/salad/measuring cup. The dark glass helps protect the oil from light and looks nice sitting next to the stove. As expensive as good quality olive oil can be, it's great to have this protection and pour control.
customer_reviews.author: Janell MichaelsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Needed a glass bottle for some awesome aged balsamic vinegar
customer_reviews.text: I got some great balsamic vinegar but it was in a plastic bottle and thats why I purchased this dark green glass bottle so it will last until its gone. The funnel they supplied made emptying the contents of the plastic bottle very easy and mess free, this bottle kit has a couple of spouts, a screw top lid, and a couple of clear plastic insert, etc. Tried the local market for a glass bottle and no luck very happy I found this affordable solution..
customer_reviews.author: jackalope

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle with accessory options
customer_reviews.text: I like the option of 2 different lids, and the accessories that come with the bottle. I was unable to use the bottle top with the flip lid, because it did not seat properly all the way down into the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just L O V E this bottle. Now I leave my bottle of olive oil on the back of my stove. Always handy. Love the two spouts they give you. More control than pouring out of a big bottle or can of OO. I feel like a chef now lol!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia D.

customer_reviews.title: It Leaks :(
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad! I was SO looking forward to this addition in my kitchen, but it leaks from the top when you're pouring the olive oil. Other than that - it's well made and has a lot of potential. The leak isn't terrible, but I wish it was actually leak proof like it says.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Thomas

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I bought.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up using a previous olive oil bottle I had and it worked great for the nozzle. I'm giving the bottle and other nozzle away as a gift! Perfect. Not sure why I was going so long without this. Makes pouring olive oil so much better! A must have if you cook with vegetable oils.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Customer

customer_reviews.title: It pours...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a glass olive oil container. Don’t know what more to say. It works as advertised but we wish that we had bought a shorter one which would be easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: George Scarlatta

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle set
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted an olive oil bottle for years and finally went for it. The attachments that come with this set are wonderful and easy to use. I like the options of different tops and spouts and the funnel works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Guggino

customer_reviews.title: Great item to buy for your kitchen or as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I buy OO in bulk from costco and I was getting tired of pouring a huge bottle morning. The spout on this is very nice and OO comes out smooth and not too fast. Comes with funnel so it is easy to fill back up again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to store oil!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle. I use olive oil a lot and hated unscrewing the cap every time and it seemed like oil would always get on the sides of the bottle. But not with this thing. And I can leave it out on my counter top and it looks better than your regular oil bottle sitting there
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle and great accessories
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and washed and dried it and filled it with olive oil. The bottle is attractive and on the small side-good for placement on your table. I like the various metal and plastic/rubber attachments which give you some choices depending on how you use it. They even provide a nice metal funnel to easily fill the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: bob a.

customer_reviews.title: BROWN GLASS IS ACTUALLY GREEN
customer_reviews.text: I thought I got this color as a mistake, but I read a bunch of reviews and it turns out, what they advertise as DARK BROWN IS ACTUALLY GREEN. Do not buy if you actually want brown glass. I’m pretty disappointed, I got it specifically for the color.
customer_reviews.author: Carley McAuliffe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect olive oil container - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I fancy myself a "chef", and love kitchen items and gadgetry that keeps this image. However, I can make a mess in no time. Olive oil seems to be my biggest problems; often, I pour out way too much. This olive oil container solves that problem. Easy to use, two different pour spouts, a funnel, and stoppers, everything a "chef" could need. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Forrester

customer_reviews.title: excellent characteristics
customer_reviews.text: My old cooking oil container was always sticky and unpleasant to handle, and the pour spout would leak. This new container has eliminated all those problems and is a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: teugene

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many olive oil bottles, the tops were impossible to get on and off and more often than not they leaked. This bottle comes with so many top options and is so easy to refill. It hasn't leaked at all. So happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Serafina

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I broke my oil bottle and ordered this one to replace it. Dark colored (good for oil) and has two dispensers - I am using the one with a little flip down cap and like that very much. Comes with two stoppers which would be useful if you buy large bottles of oil at a time and need to store the extra. Very happy with purchase and good price.
customer_reviews.author: CBudd

customer_reviews.title: It fixed my problem
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Love the drip free spout. The outside of my Olive Oil bottle was terrible; every time I used the oil some would run down the outside of the bottle making an oily mess. This took care of it. = )
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need!!
customer_reviews.text: Was glad to get this oil dispenser as it was hard to pour the right amount from the bottle that I purchased. This is exactly what I needed. Now I can dispense just a small or large amount as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbe

product_meta.title: Aozita 17oz Glass Olive Oil Bottle - 500ml Dark Brown Oil & Vinegar Cruet with Pourers and Funnel - Olive Oil Carafe Decanter for Kitchen
feature_bullets: ELEGANT OLIVE OIL DISPENSER BUNDLE - Aozita glass olive oil bottle with spout stoppers make it easy to dispense oil with appropriate amount - Get less oil consumption and healthier eating.

NON-DRIP DESIGN - 18/8 Stainless steel pour spouts with sealed cap and flap cap fit the bottle well and perfectly keep dust out. Everyone can pour and dispense oil with a nice stream without leakage. Ideal for dispensing cooking oils, dressings and vinegars.

KEEP YOUR OLIVE OIL FRESH - The dark brown glass efficiently protects olive oil from sunlight and largely prolongs the preservation time. Black screw cap & white inner cork makes long-term / air-tight storage possible.
SOLVE REFILLING PROBLEM - 18/8 stainless aided funnel helps fill and refill the liquid easily without leakages. Keeps all things clean and help you get rid of slimy hands.
NO-RISK PURCHASE:- If you have any issue with our products, please don't hesitate to contact us, we will try our best to find a satisfactory solution for you within 24 hours.
